scripts.first-migrate: cd src && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate --name create-academiclevel.js
scripts.second-migrate: cd src && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate --from create-candidatepost.js --to create-company.js && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate --name create-workingtype.js
scripts.third-migrate: cd src && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate --from create-companycareer.js --to create-position.js
scripts.semi-migrate: cd src && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate --name create-post.js && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate --name create-candidate.js
scripts.migrate: npm run first-migrate && npm run second-migrate && npm run third-migrate && npm run semi-migrate && npm run final-migrate
